author: saya
msg: Added txn demarcation for the ldap requests. Whether this is the right place is open to debate. Currently I put the txn begin/end here for the following reasons:
*EntryFilteringCursor is left open and next() on it is called in search handler.
*There are cases where interceptor chain is reentered by calling session methods. All operations triggered by an ldap request should be part of the same txn.

author: joern
msg: No jira, fixed typo in local variable name. Thanks to Aliaksandr Autayeu for providing a patch.

author: joern
msg: OPENNLP-402 Extended javadoc.  Thanks to Aliaksandr Autayeu for providing a patch.
